title: Unpacking the Latest Lummis-Gillibrand Bill Draft
description: U.S. Senators Cynthia Lummis and Kirsten Gillibrand have developed a second draft of their comprehensive crypto regulation bill. Chances are slim that it will, as a single bill, advance to becoming a law, but it may still drive a broader conversation within Congress on what sort of provisions smaller pieces of legislation should include.

title: 'Galaxy Commanders' NFT Space Battler Coming to Immutable zkEVM
description: Upcoming PC and mobile space game Galaxy Commanders hails from MagmaByte, a startup founded by EA and Nexon veterans.

title: Sideways SOPR: A prelude to Bitcoin’s next big move?
description:
Bitcoin’s price has been a study in tranquility since it broke through the $30,000 level, setting a tight trading range between $30,000 and $31,000 for most of July. This period of low volatility has left many traders and analysts uncertain about future price movements. However, on-chain data, specifically the Spent Output Profit Ratio (SOPR), may […]

title: Ethereum Price Prediction 2023-2032: Will ETH reach $8000 soon?
description: Ethereum Price Prediction 2023-2032 “The Merge did not change anything for holders/users.” Is that a fact? title: G20 embraces FSB’s crypto recommendations amid increasing regulatory pressure
description: Nirmala Sitharaman, the Finance Minister of India and the current G20 president, announced on Tuesday that the Group of Twenty (G20) has endorsed the recommendations from the Financial Stability Board (FSB) concerning crypto asset activities and global stablecoin arrangements. This decisive nod from the G20 comes after an eventful year in the crypto sphere marked ... Read more
